耦.definition: a pair; a mate; a couple; to couple; plowshare

耦合.definition: coupling (physics); copula (statistics); to be coupled (with sth)

耦園.definition: Couple's Retreat Garden in Suzhou, Jiangsu

耦居.definition: to live together (as husband and wife)

耦語.definition: to have a tete-à-tete; to whisper to each other
